title: :o
content:
Hi, it's me again.

Right now I'm suffering again from another post limit. I have no idea who's hating me so much but can it please be removed again?

Thanks in advance.

Best Regards,

Holy Djaser

Edit- Funny enough, this account has a post limit too!

title: Re: :o
content:
Xtraverse isn't very Keen in checking his mail box, I mailed him last time about it too but that didn't help.

That custom title looks like one of his typical jokes, I like it though.

Reply to the post beneath: No Xtraverse, if you read the first post again you'll see that I asked to remove the post limit of my original account, but if you're not to busy then perhaps you could set both free?-----------------

content:

title: Re: f
content:
Yep, again and yep, eK did it.
I have no definite proof in this and first I didn't suspect eK at lowering himself like this but I still find it amazing to see how I always get a post limit when eK visit this place without posting.

But Im grateful that he was so kind not to ban my clones this time.
